import Head from "next/head"; import { loadStripe } from "@stripe/stripe-js"; const stripePromise = loadStripe( process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY ); import Table from "react-bootstrap/Table"; const Cart = (props) => { const handleClick = async (evt) => { const stripe = await stripePromise; const response = await fetch("/api/checkout_sessions/index", { method: "POST", }); const session = await response.json(); const result = await stripe.redirectToCheckout({ sessionId: session.id, }); if (result.error) { console.log("Error"); } }; // const [value, setValue] = React.useState( // JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("product")) // ); return (
OJOS | Cart

Subtotal $100.00

); }; export default Cart;
